text.name: AD_parkVehicle_noPosSet
text.text: No parking destination assigned. Please assign the currently selected target with right mouse button.

text.name: AD_new_marker_helptext
text.text: Please enter new name (Stop with enter key)

text.name: gui_ad_trailerOffset_tooltip
text.text: Offset of trailer unloading position - front/rear

text.name: gui_ad_lookahead_turning_tooltip
text.text: The distance the vehicle looks ahead to adjust steering to follow the next segment

text.name: gui_ad_lookahead_braking_tooltip
text.text: The distance the vehicle looks ahead to adjust the speed to the expected turn radius

text.name: gui_ad_useFastestRoute_tooltip
text.text: Take the driving speed into consideration instead of simple distances, when calculating best routes

text.name: gui_ad_avoidMarkers_tooltip
text.text: The pathfinding tries to find detours around targets. Useful to avoid jams

text.name: gui_ad_siloEmpty_tooltip
text.text: How a pickup and deliver driver reacts to an empty silo

text.name: gui_ad_autoConnect_start_tooltip
text.text: Auto connect suitable node on start of recording

text.name: gui_ad_autoConnect_end_tooltip
text.text: Auto connect suitable node on end of recording

text.name: gui_ad_parkInField_tooltip
text.text: After unloading a combine - if not parked in fruit

text.name: gui_ad_unloadFillLevel_tooltip
text.text: After unloading combine. Directly go to deliver at this fill level.

text.name: gui_ad_findDriver_tooltip
text.text: Search for close by drivers (Ignore destination)

text.name: gui_ad_gui_scale_tooltip
text.text: Leave default to use in game scaling settings

text.name: gui_ad_driverWages_tooltip
text.text: Driver wages will be multiplied with this value

text.name: gui_ad_smoothField_tooltip
text.text: Generated field courses to and from combine will be smoothed (experimental)

text.name: gui_ad_recalculationSpeed_tooltip
text.text: Higher values will lead to laggy gameplay while recalculating

text.name: gui_ad_showNextPath_tooltip
text.text: En/Disable the display of the next two waypoints

text.name: gui_ad_avoidFruit_tooltip
text.text: Combine unloader tries to avoid fruit destruction

text.name: gui_ad_pathFinderTime_tooltip
text.text: Determines how long pathfinding algorithm is allowed to search for collision free path to/from combine. (Potential fps-impact)

text.name: gui_ad_lineHeight_tooltip
text.text: Line height in editor mode. Either on ground level or above the tractor

text.name: gui_ad_allowConsoleStyle_tooltip
text.text: Allow advanced target input via keyboard - default right click on target text field

text.name: gui_ad_enableTrafficDetection_tooltip
text.text: Advanced collision detection, which also detects AI-traffic, signs, fences etc

text.name: gui_ad_refillSeedAndFertilizer_tooltip
text.text: Enables AutoDrive to refill both seed and fertilizer compartments, if one of these is selected as filltype.

text.name: gui_ad_shovelWidth_tooltip
text.text: If automatically detected shovel width is too small, it can be increased with this value

text.name: gui_ad_preCallDriver_tooltip
text.text: Pre call unloader at the set fill level.

text.name: gui_ad_preCallLevel_tooltip
text.text: Pre call unloader at the set fill level.

text.name: gui_ad_chaseCombine_tooltip
text.text: Unlaoder follows combine after being pre called

text.name: gui_ad_distributeToFolder_tooltip
text.text: All targets in same folder will be rotated as unload targets.
